name: Rencana Pengajuan Anggaran Proyek
query:
SELECT "Kas Bon Proyek" type, CONCAT("", fpep.name, "") name, COALESCE(e.first_name, fpep.owner) peminta, CONCAT("", p.project_name, "") project, CONCAT("", p.project_nick_name, "") project_nick_name, fpep.total_budget, fpep.purpose, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status FROM `tabForm Payment Entry Project` fpep INNER JOIN `tabProject` p ON p.name = fpep.project LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = fpep.owner LEFT JOIN (SELECT form_payment_entry_project, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and is_hand_over_progress = 0 GROUP BY form_payment_entry_project) pe ON pe.form_payment_entry_project = fpep.name WHERE fpep.required_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND fpep.docstatus = 1 UNION SELECT "Slip Pembayaran Supplier" type, CONCAT("", fpep.name, "") name, COALESCE(e.first_name, fpep.owner) peminta, CASE WHEN p.name THEN CONCAT("", p.project_name, "") ELSE "" END project, CASE WHEN p.name THEN CONCAT("", p.project_nick_name, "") ELSE "" END project_nick_name, fpep.total_budget, fpep.purpose, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN fpep.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status FROM `tabForm Payment Entry Supplier` fpep LEFT JOIN `tabProject` p ON p.name = fpep.project LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = fpep.owner LEFT JOIN (SELECT form_payment_entry_supplier, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and is_hand_over_progress = 0 GROUP BY form_payment_entry_supplier) pe ON pe.form_payment_entry_supplier = fpep.name WHERE fpep.required_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND fpep.docstatus = 1 UNION SELECT "Slip Pembayaran Subkon" type, CONCAT("", sps.name, "") name, COALESCE(e.first_name, sps.owner) peminta, CONCAT("", p.project_name, "") project, CONCAT("", p.project_nick_name, "") project_nick_name, sps.total_cost total_budget, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, sps.total_cost-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN sps.total_cost-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status, CONCAT(sps.contractor_name, " ", hop.progress_sequence, " ", FORMAT(hop.progress_achieved,2), "% ", hop.job_name) purpose FROM `tabSlip Pembayaran Subkon` sps INNER JOIN `tabProject` p ON p.name = sps.project INNER JOIN `tabHand Over Progress` hop ON hop.name = sps.hand_over_progress LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = sps.owner LEFT JOIN (SELECT hand_over_progress, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and is_hand_over_progress = 1 GROUP BY hand_over_progress) pe ON pe.hand_over_progress = sps.name WHERE sps.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND sps.docstatus = 1;
